title: Cassiopeia.
body:
I quite like the new update for cass:3 , but it doesn't  really promote her "Poison" theme. Her lore is really small._. like it needs to be updated:3 and tbh theres not much notice about sivir and cass's story. Overall the cass update changes her quite alot and she has a lot of difficulty in playing now, but she still wrecks :3.

Is it just me or is cass supposed be gaining random stacks during the whole game even from spawn ***without*** poisioning any enemy?
Ive just played a few normal and aram games with her and i just gain stack the whole game even at base without hitting and enemy champions lol. 

So yeah~ Share your thoughts on what do you think about cassiopeia's rework and what can be better etc c:

replies.body:
Cass and Sivir's lore was tied into Azir, Nasus and Renekton's lore in the Shurima update.

If you want to see it go watch the videos.

Ahh so their lores have cass in them xD.
Seen that video, Cass is a b**** -.-
Thanks for the reply~
Cass has always been a %%%%%, if you'd like to read her old lore just go to the wiki.
